page.title: 10Leisure in Handsacre
page.content:
In our questionnaire we had a section for Leisure. We made a tally of our results to find most and least popular hobbies. From our results we found that Fathers' most popular hobby was Gardening, followed by Sport. Mothers' most popular hobby is Knitting, followed by Reading. The most popular sons' hobby is Football. Daughters, on the other hand like Reading the most, while collecting is second favourite.
In the summer holidays there is a playscheme for two weeks of the six week holiday we have. This is run by the Local Parish Council. There are also a number of other clubs(Guides, Cubs,etc.) The range of clubs is anything from a leek growing club to Brownies. We had quite a job putting the Brownies.
